data.message: Facebook this is ridiculous I've been blocked 3 times in a month. And I even slowed down my sharing contact. I have multiple pages and groups, I also pay to promote. You really know how to target people. And I've appealed several times, heard nothing....customer service is horrible no contact number worth while.

replies.message: Hi John. We appreciate your patience as our team reviews your report. In the meantime, you may be able to track the status of your report in the Support Dashboard. Visit our Help Center to learn more: http://bit.ly/2zPq1tA. -Mollie
Okay, thanks for the reply. However I've checked, and checked. I still haven't had a reply from the last time I was blocked. Is there a customer service number?
